name: AlexDGlover.github.io
body:
# AlexDGlover

## Here are a couple projects I'm currently working on or have recently worked on 

* "Who's that person in that thing?" App (released)
  * GitHub Repo - https://github.com/alexdglover/whosthatpersoninthatthing
  * Demo - http://experimental.alexdglover.com/wtpitt/

* SpaceProgram - a simple physics game built using Phaser (still in development)
  * GitHub Repo - https://github.com/alexdglover/SpaceProgram
  * Demo - http://experimental.alexdglover.com/spaceprogram/index.html

* inline-iptables recipe for Chef (released)
  * [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/alexdglover/inline-iptables)

You can also check out http://alexdglover.com for my blog
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
